title: Wildest Dreams (Taylor's Version)
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:07.05] He said, "Let's get out of this town
[00:09.93] Drive out of the city, away from the crowds"
[00:13.60] I thought, "Heaven can't help me now"
[00:16.05] Nothing lasts forever
[00:19.01] But this is gonna take me down
[00:21.28] He's so tall, and handsome as hell
[00:23.01] He's so bad, but he does it so well
[00:28.07] I can see the end as it begins
[00:31.08] My one condition is
[00:34.60] Say you'll remember me standing in a nice dress
[00:38.78] Staring at the sunset, babe
[00:41.21] Red lips and rosy cheeks
[00:43.53] Say you'll see me again
[00:45.62] Even if it's just in your wildest dreams, ah-ah, ha
[00:53.91] Wildest dreams, ah-ah, ha
[01:04.58] I said, "No one has to know what we do"
[01:08.11] His hands are in my hair, his clothes are in my room
[01:12.36] And his voice is a familiar sound
[01:15.25] Nothing lasts forever
[01:17.76] But this is getting good now
[01:19.76] He's so tall, and handsome as hell
[01:23.18] He's so bad, but he does it so well
[01:26.53] And when we've had our very last kiss
[01:30.13] My last request, it is
[01:33.13] Say you'll remember me standing in a nice dress
[01:36.88] Staring at the sunset, babe
[01:40.23] Red lips and rosy cheeks
[01:42.50] Say you'll see me again
[01:44.32] Even if it's just in your wildest dreams, ah-ah, ha (ah-ah, ha)
[01:53.44] Wildest dreams, ah-ah, ha
[02:00.79] You'll see me in hindsight, tangled up with you all night
[02:03.88] Burning it down
[02:07.26] Someday when you leave me, I bet these memories
[02:10.79] Follow you around
[02:14.24] You'll see me in hindsight, tangled up with you all night
[02:17.57] Burning (burning) it (it) down (down)
[02:21.47] Someday when you leave me, I bet these memories
[02:24.65] Follow (follow) you (you) around (around)
[02:29.44] (Follow you around)

[02:35.44] Staring at the sunset, babe
[02:38.50] Red lips and rosy cheeks

[02:45.27] Say you'll remember me standing in a nice dress
[02:50.12] Staring at the sunset, babe
[02:53.98] Red lips and rosy cheeks
[02:55.85] Say you'll see me again
[02:58.11] Even if it's just in your (just pretend, just pretend)
[03:00.74] Wildest dreams, ah-ah, ha (ah-ah-ah-ah)
[03:05.62] Wildest dreams, ah-ah, ha
